short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a custom new tab page of mostly-used sites and  a custom web page zoomer for the older folks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The current browser option settings are not for everyone, especially the senior citizens who wishes to surf the internet. Grannify  zooms in website elements with large buttons and provides a simplified new tab page.
